writer.name: 法尔哈德·梅兰法尔 Farhad Mehranfar

director.name: 法尔哈德·梅兰法尔 Farhad Mehranfar

introduction: “风中的火焰”讲述的是生活在伊朗北部吉兰省偏远乡村里和南部格什姆岛上的女孩子们的故事。在寄宿学校学习使她们有机会了解她们的国家-伊朗的不同地区以及那里的风土人情。“Flame in the Wind” is the story of the girls who live in remote areas of villages in Gilan Province in the north and Qeshm Island in the south of Iran. Attending boarding schools, they have a chance to get familiar with different regions and climates of their country, Iran.
